attributes.review: I downloaded this app with an open heart and gaping soul. I love apps. And I love presidents‚ù§Ô∏è Upon opening the app I allowed it to send me messages, and IT BEGAN SENDING ME LINKS TO THE ADDRESSES OF PEOPLE THAT DO NOT ACTIVELY SUPPORT TRUMP. It started out subtle, a message here a message there. Little hints to get me to hop in my car(silver Toyota Corolla, with black accents((runs so smooth:D))), and go to their houses, and VERBALLY ABUSE THEM. One of the links that was sent out took me to a writing workshop web sight that led me through writing a very mean poem to a woman  named Pamela who lives in Rhode Island. The next text message from the app told me to drive to her house. I got to the first stoplight on the way there and it gave me time to consider my actions. I realized I was being manipulated and tricked by the app. It took me six months of therapy to come to terms with my actions. I do not want anybody to go through what I went through. I sometimes imagine what would have happened if I went to Pamela‚Äôs house in Rhode Island. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: THIS APP DOXES PEOPLE
